name: Gnome-body Like You
description:
Getting out there in the gnome dating scene is tough work when you live in the middle of the forbidden forest. Luckily, the newest app Mushy is able to help you find the love of your pointy life. 

After finding a match with one of the seven of your compatible gnome, use their bio to try and create the perfect mushroom bouquet. The mushroom bouquet is a traditional gnome dating ritual initiated by scavenging the surrounding area for your love interest's favorite kind of mushroom. 

Controls:

wasd to walk

1-5 to select slots

E/F to pick up mushrooms

Q to drop selected mushroom
